timeline.bodyText: Will this be adding null for multiTenant=false?

timeline.bodyText:
A comment somewhere around here would be good to remind us that there are 2 indexes on the first tenant's view, 1, on the second, and so on, to explain the assert, which is otherwise counterintuitive.
Alternately, you could have a map of tenant id -> expected view index count that you build in the prepareForTest method and reference in the assert here, but that might be overkill. Up to you.
